attributes.action: Ask the DVLA to thoroughly investigate individuals before revoking a driving licences for medical reasons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Responsibility rests with the Medical Advisers at DVLA to apply medical standards and decide whether a person is fit to drive.  
The DVLA currently has the right to investigate any UK driving licence holder for medical investigation at any time and the consequences could be devastating. 
This petition is to ask the DVLA medical department to investigate individuals thoroughly before revoking their licence. The current rules for investigation are very weak and the DVLA do not actually meet individuals before revoking licences and making decisions against the wishes of the individuals GP.
